ai-tha-ap246:1.2_0: which leads out to the world.
ai-tha-ap246:1.3_0: As a mighty flood sweeps off a sleeping village,
ai-tha-ap246:2.2_0: As a bird was worshipped by the flowers,
ai-tha-ap246:2.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap246:4.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Vijaya.
